changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}api_statistics_daily` ( `id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `space_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '空间ID(关联#vika_space#space_id)', `statistics_time` varchar(10) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '统计时间', `total_count` bigint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '调用总数', `success_count` bigint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '请求成功次数', `failure_count` bigint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '请求失败次数', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, KEY `idx_space_id` (`space_id`) USING BTREE, KEY `idx_time` (`statistics_time` DESC) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='开放平台-API每日统计表';
